AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: SCR_C_OrderDeliveryViaRuleValidation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.IsActive='Y' AND ((COALESCE(@EM_Ssa_Specialdoctype@,'.')<>'SSAPOSORDER' AND AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('P','S','SCR_P','D','SCR_C','SCR_RV','SCR_DP','SCR_VSGR','SCR_P_NIC','SCR_C_NIC','SCR_VSGR_NIC')) OR (COALESCE(@EM_Ssa_Specialdoctype@,'.')='SSAPOSORDER' AND AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('P','SCR_C','SCR_VSGR','SCR_P_NIC','SCR_C_NIC','SCR_VSGR_NIC')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: SCR_Billofexchange Payment Terms Val Categ
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE' AND em_sco_isboeterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOCHECK' AND em_scr_ischeckterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOCREDIT' AND em_scr_iscreditterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@Specialmethod@,'.')='SCODEPOSIT' AND (em_scr_iscreditterm='Y' OR em_sco_specialpayterm='SCOINMEDIATETERM')) OR (COALESCE(@Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOCASH' AND em_sco_specialpayterm='SCOINMEDIATETERM') OR (COALESCE(@Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE' AND COALESCE(@Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOCHECK' AND COALESCE(@Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOCREDIT' AND COALESCE(@Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCODEPOSIT' AND COALESCE(@Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOCASH'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Invoice Payment Terms Val Categ
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE' AND em_sco_isboeterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOCHECK' AND em_scr_ischeckterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOCREDIT' AND em_scr_iscreditterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCODEPOSIT' AND em_sco_specialpayterm='SCOINMEDIATETERM') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOCASH' AND em_sco_specialpayterm='SCOINMEDIATETERM') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.') NOT IN ('SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE','SCOCHECK','SCOCREDIT','SCODEPOSIT','SCOCASH') AND ((em_scr_iscreditterm='Y' OR em_scr_ischeckterm='Y') OR (em_sco_isboeterm='N' AND em_scr_ischeckterm='N' AND em_scr_iscreditterm='N'))))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org No Legal Entity
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: exists (select 1 from ad_orgtype where ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id = ad_org.ad_orgtype_id and islegalentity='N') AND IsReady='Y' AND Ad_Org_ID!='0'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_BPartner PO Payment Terms Val Categ
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Pospecialmethod@,'.')='SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE' AND em_sco_isboeterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Pospecialmethod@,'.')='SCOCHECK' AND em_scr_ischeckterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Pospecialmethod@,'.')='SCOCREDIT' AND em_scr_iscreditterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Pospecialmethod@,'.')='SCODEPOSIT' AND (em_scr_iscreditterm='Y' OR em_sco_specialpayterm='SCOINMEDIATETERM')) OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Pospecialmethod@,'.')='SCOCASH' AND em_sco_specialpayterm='SCOINMEDIATETERM') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Pospecialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE' AND COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Pospecialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOCHECK' AND COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Pospecialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOCREDIT' AND COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Pospecialmethod@,'.')<>'SCODEPOSIT' AND COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Pospecialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOCASH'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Order Payment Terms Val Categ
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE' AND em_sco_isboeterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOCHECK' AND em_scr_ischeckterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOCREDIT' AND em_scr_iscreditterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCODEPOSIT' AND em_sco_specialpayterm='SCOINMEDIATETERM') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOCASH' AND em_sco_specialpayterm='SCOINMEDIATETERM') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.') NOT IN ('SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE','SCOCHECK','SCOCREDIT','SCODEPOSIT','SCOCASH') AND ((em_scr_iscreditterm='Y' OR em_scr_ischeckterm='Y') OR (em_sco_isboeterm='N' AND em_scr_ischeckterm='N' AND em_scr_iscreditterm='N'))))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_BPartner Payment Terms Val Categ
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE' AND em_sco_isboeterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOCHECK' AND em_scr_ischeckterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOCREDIT' AND em_scr_iscreditterm='Y') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCODEPOSIT' AND (em_scr_iscreditterm='Y' OR em_sco_specialpayterm='SCOINMEDIATETERM')) OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')='SCOCASH' AND em_sco_specialpayterm='SCOINMEDIATETERM') OR (COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOBILLOFEXCHANGE' AND COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOCHECK' AND COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOCREDIT' AND COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCODEPOSIT' AND COALESCE(@EM_Sco_Specialmethod@,'.')<>'SCOCASH'))
